title: Edit a component palette
content:
To edit a component palette

  1. Click the gear icon and select Manage Component Palettes.
  2. In the Component Palettes dialog, select a component you want to edit.
  3. Click the Edit Component Palette icon.
  4. Offer the desired information, and click Save. For information about the specific fields, see Create a component palette.
  5. Click Save and then click Done.

Related topics

  • Create a component palette
